prompt: Design a dark-themed analytics dashboard with a deep charcoal background (#212121). The top app bar should display 'Analytics Hub' in white text with a refresh icon on the right. Include three metric cards arranged vertically, showing 'Active Users' (12,345), 'Total Sales' ($18,900), and 'Engagement Rate' (4.5%) with amber accents, circular icons, and a subtle glow effect. Each card should have a 16px border radius and 12px padding. Below, add a line chart visualization (250px height) with a gradient amber-to-orange fill, encased in a dark card with a faint border. At the bottom, include a data table with columns 'Date', 'Users', 'Sales', and 'Engagement', using alternating dark gray and black rows. Use 20px padding throughout and a column-based layout for a cohesive dark aesthetic.
